sentences.en: By half distance we held a comfortable two-lap lead.
sentences.cn: 到半程时，我们轻松领先两圈。

sentences.en: drinking water supplied by old-fashioned lead pipes
sentences.cn: 由老式铅管输送的饮用水

sentences.en: Ethnic tensions among the republics could lead to civil war.
sentences.cn: 共和国之间紧张的种族关系可能会引发内战。

sentences.en: events leading up to the coup.
sentences.cn: 导致政变的事件

sentences.en: He took Dickon by the hand to lead him into the house.
sentences.cn: 他牵着迪康的手把他领进屋。

sentences.en: He walks with a stick but still leads his soldiers into battle.
sentences.cn: 尽管他拄着拐杖，但他仍带领士兵上战场。

sentences.en: He was involved in oil, zinc and lead prospecting.
sentences.cn: 他参与了石油、锌和铅的勘探。

sentences.en: Her hatred of them would never lead her to murder.
sentences.cn: 她虽说仇恨他们，但绝不至于去杀人。

sentences.en: It will lead to devaluation of a number of European currencies.
sentences.cn: 这将会造成数种欧洲货币的贬值。

sentences.en: Lack of exercise can lead to feelings of depression and exhaustion.
sentences.cn: 缺乏锻炼会导致抑郁和疲劳。

sentences.en: Nina Ananiashvili and Alexei Fadeyechev from the Bolshoi Ballet dance the leads.
sentences.cn: 来自莫斯科大剧院芭蕾舞团的妮娜·安娜尼雅什维莉和阿历克谢·费德耶切夫担任主角。

sentences.en: Other countries are likely to follow the U.S.’s lead.
sentences.cn: 其他国家很可能会效法美国。

sentences.en: People who lead busy lives have no time to stop and reflect.
sentences.cn: 忙忙碌碌的人们无暇停下来反思。

sentences.en: Politicians say it could lead to a dissolution of parliament.
sentences.cn: 政客们说这可能会导致议会解散。

sentences.en: Powers was cast in the lead role (= he was chosen to play it ).
sentences.cn: 鲍尔斯被选中饰演主角。

sentences.en: Some of the finest drinking glasses are made from lead crystal.
sentences.cn: 一些最高档的酒杯是用铅晶质玻璃制成的。

sentences.en: That was enough to give Mansell an unassailable lead.
sentences.cn: 那足以让曼塞尔获得别人无法撼动的领先地位。

sentences.en: The black population in the 1960s looked to Ali for a lead (= looked to him to show them what they should do ).
sentences.cn: 20世纪60年代的黑人视阿里为黑人的楷模。

sentences.en: The Government should give industry a lead in tackling racism (= show what other people should do ).
sentences.cn: 政府在处理种族歧视问题上应该为企业树立榜样。

sentences.en: The horses were led to safety.
sentences.cn: 马匹被牵到安全的地方。

sentences.en: The oil company jousts with Esso for lead position in UK sales.
sentences.cn: 这家石油公司和埃索公司角逐英国市场销量的榜首位置。

sentences.en: The police have checked out dozens of leads, but have yet to find the killer.
sentences.cn: 警方核查了许许多多的线索，但还是没有找到杀人凶手。

sentences.en: The president and vice president led the mourners.
sentences.cn: 总统和副总统带领着送葬人群。

sentences.en: The Turkish situation makes the lead in tomorrow's Guardian.
sentences.cn: 土耳其局势将成为明天《卫报》的头条。

sentences.en: The U.S. took the lead in declaring war on terrorism.
sentences.cn: 美国带头向恐怖主义宣战。

sentences.en: There are recognised black spots in marriages which can lead to trouble.
sentences.cn: 婚姻中有一些公认的容易引发问题的雷区。

sentences.en: This can lead to bodily weakness and muscle wastage.
sentences.cn: 这样可能会导致身体虚弱和肌肉萎缩。

words.tran_cn: 铅灰色的；铅制的；沉闷的；铅一般重的
促使（lead的过去分词）；引导；带领
领导；[化学]铅；导线；石墨；榜样

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式，主北美)加快脚步，加快工作

phrases.phrase: get the lead out【非正式用语】

phrases.tran_cn: 领先；主要的；占主导地位的
铅酸蓄电池；铅酸电池；密封蓄电池
精力，活力，（尤指）男人性 能力
&I{【棒球】} 一局中的第一位击球手
氧化铅；一氧化铅；密陀僧
n. 铅中毒；[美国俚语]中弹受伤
使误入歧途，使想入非非
(非正式)（尤指用欺骗手段）牵着鼻子走
误导，欺骗（尤指使相信自己引人喜爱）

phrases.phrase: lead someone up (或北美down) the garden path
phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)提供误导的线索（或信号）
n. 提前期；订货至交货的时间；研制周期；交付周期
用前言引入（一主要话题）
(非正式)（拳击运动员）未保护下巴

trans.tran_cn: 领先的地位，超前量，榜样，线索，主角，狗绳，导线，铅，铅笔芯，子弹
trans.tran_en: if someone follows someone else’s lead, they do the same as the other person has done

trans.tran_cn: 在…前面走，引路，连通，通至，领先，领导，导致，使得，引导，过（某种生活）引出，开牌
trans.tran_en: If you lead a group of people, you walk or ride in front of them
If you lead a group of people, you walk or ride in front of them
If you lead a group of people, you walk or ride in front of them
